info.title: About Communities
info.desc: Communities are automatically detected groups of related entities using the Louvain algorithm. They help organize knowledge and reveal patterns in your data. Click "Rebuild Communities" to re-run the detection algorithm after adding new episodes.

dedup.desc: Find and merge duplicate entities based on name similarity

clean.title: Clean Stale Edges

rebuild.title: Rebuild Communities
rebuild.desc: Redetect communities using Louvain algorithm. Needed after major graph updates.

export.title: Export Data

high_duplication.title: High duplication rate detected
high_duplication.desc: We found {{count}} potentially duplicate entities. Running 'Deduplicate Entities' is recommended.

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.desc: Some operations like merging duplicates and cleaning edges cannot be undone. We recommend running 'Check' first to see what would be affected before executing.

emptyState.greeting: How can I help you today?
emptyState.subtitle: Your intelligent AI assistant is ready to help with analysis, coding, writing, and more.

cards.analyzeTrendsDesc: Identify key patterns and insights across your data streams
cards.synthesizeReportsDesc: Transform complex findings into executive summaries
cards.generateCodeDesc: Write, review, and optimize code with AI assistance
cards.quickAutomationDesc: Build workflows and automate repetitive tasks
cards.analyzeTrendsPrompt: Analyze the trends and patterns in my project data. Identify key insights and anomalies.
cards.synthesizeReportsPrompt: Help me synthesize a report from my recent findings. Create a clear executive summary.
cards.generateCodePrompt: Help me write code. What programming language and task do you need help with?
cards.quickAutomationPrompt: Help me automate a repetitive task. Describe the workflow you want to streamline.

sidebar.title: Agent Chat
sidebar.startNewChat: Start a new chat to begin

inputBar.placeholder: Ask me anything, or type '/' for commands...
inputBar.planPlaceholder: Describe what you want to plan in detail...

canvas.emptyDescription: Code, documents, and previews from the agent will appear here. Ask the agent to generate or edit content.

undo.title: Undo Action
undo.description: This will ask the agent to undo the action. The agent will attempt to revert any changes made.

templates.title: Prompt Templates
templates.analyzeCodebasePrompt: Analyze the codebase structure and provide a high-level overview including architecture patterns, key dependencies, and areas for improvement.
templates.findBugsPrompt: Search for potential bugs, security vulnerabilities, and code quality issues in the project. Focus on critical issues first.
templates.performanceAuditPrompt: Analyze the application for performance bottlenecks including database queries, API response times, memory usage, and frontend rendering.
templates.writeTestsPrompt: Write comprehensive unit tests for the most critical modules. Aim for 80%+ coverage with meaningful test cases.
templates.refactorCodePrompt: Identify and refactor code that violates DRY, SOLID principles, or has high complexity. Propose cleaner alternatives.
templates.addFeaturePrompt: I want to add a new feature: [describe feature]. Plan the implementation, identify files to modify, and implement it step by step.
templates.fixErrorPrompt: I'm getting this error: [paste error]. Diagnose the root cause and fix it.
templates.writeDocsPrompt: Generate comprehensive documentation for the project including API reference, setup guide, and architecture overview.
templates.writeReadmePrompt: Create or improve the project README with sections for: overview, quick start, installation, configuration, usage examples, and contributing.
templates.explainCodePrompt: Explain how the core system works, walking through the main execution flow from entry point to key outputs.
templates.brainstormPrompt: Help me brainstorm ideas for improving this project. Consider UX improvements, new features, technical debt reduction, and scalability.
templates.marketplaceDesc: Browse and install SubAgent templates to extend your agent capabilities.

onboarding.welcomeDesc: Your AI-powered workspace for analysis, coding, and automation.
onboarding.inputDesc: Type messages naturally, or use / to access commands and tools.
onboarding.layoutDesc: Switch between Chat, Code, Desktop, Focus, and Canvas modes with Cmd+1-5.
onboarding.templateDesc: Browse pre-built prompts for common tasks.
onboarding.searchDesc: Use Cmd+F to search within any conversation.

theme.highContrastDescription: Enhanced visibility with stronger colors and borders

user_profile.title: Personal Profile
